termsConditionUsePara1.text: Please read these Terms of Use (these “Terms”) carefully as they govern your use of (which includes access to) Soins Karisma’s personalized services for unlimited beauty services and other content, including all of our websites and software applications that incorporate or link to these Terms (collectively, the “Soins Karisma service”) and any photos, videos or other material that is made available through the Soins Karisma platform (the “Content”).

termsConditionUsePara2.text: Use of the Soins Karisma Service may be subject to additional terms and conditions presented by Soins karisma inc, which are hereby incorporated by this reference into these Terms. By signing up for, or otherwise using, the Soins Karisma Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, then you must not use the Soins Karisma Service or access any services or platform of Soins Karisma.

termsConditionUsePara3.text: THESE TERMS CONTAIN A MANDATORY ARBITRATION PROVISION THAT, AS FURTHER SET FORTH IN SECTION 6 BELOW, REQUIRES THE USE OF ARBITRATION ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS TO RESOLVE DISPUTES, RATHER THAN JURY TRIALS OR ANY OTHER COURT PROCEEDINGS, OR CLASS ACTIONS OF ANY KIND.

legalNoticePara1.text: Soins Karismä website has been edited by developers and UX designers employed as employees for the company. The website was drafted by the heads of the marketing and communication divisions.

legalNoticePara2.text: Soins Karismä’s head office is located at 249 Rue Saint-Jacques, Montreal, QC, Canada.

legalNoticePara3.text: Karismä’s website is hosted by the Google Cloud platform.

legalNoticePara4.text: Simply Book Me is the booking system in which the customer service schedules the appointments of each member.

legalNoticePara5.text: Stripe is the payment platform that allows members to make secure transactions.

legalNoticePara6.text: Members and customer service can chat on the Trengo platform and on social media – Facebook, Instagram.

legalNoticePara7.text: To reach the Head Office, clients can call +1 (514)665-7059 or can send an email at the address (michel@soinskarisma.com)

serviceProviderPara.text: These Terms are between you and Soins Karisma Inc, 249 Rue Saint-Jacques, Montréal, QC H2Y 1M6

preamblePara1.text: Soins Karismä takes great importance to the relationship with its customers, transparency and honesty about its motivations and business model is necessary for a young company bringing a brand new concept in the beauty and wellness market.

preamblePara2.text: For this reason, we make available our Terms of Use, including our Privacy Policy, in order to inform our customers of the information we collect, how we use it, to whom we may transmit it and how to access it.

preamblePara3.text: We treat all your personal information as confidential. They are stored on a secure server and we comply with data and consumer protection legislation.

ageRequirementPara.text: BY USING THE SOINS KARISMA SERVICE, YOU AFFIRM THAT YOU ARE 18 YEARS OR OLDER TO ENTER INTO THESE TERMS, OR, IF YOU ARE NOT, THAT YOU ARE 13 YEARS OR OLDER AND HAVE OBTAINED PARENTAL OR GUARDIAN CONSENT TO ENTER INTO THESE TERMS. Additionally, in order to use the Soins Karisma Service and access any Platform, you represent that: you reside in Canada, and any registration and account information that you submit to Soins Karisma is true, accurate, and complete, and you agree to keep it that way at all times.

soinsKarismaService.text: The Soins Karisma Service Provided by Us

soinsKarismaServicePara1.text: At Soins Karismä we provide many service options. Some service options are provided free-of-charge, while other options require payment before they can be accessed (the “Paid Subscriptions”). We may also offer special promotional plans, memberships, or services, including offerings of third-party products and services. We are not responsible for the products and services provided by such third parties.

soinsKarismaServicePara3.text: From time to time, we or others on our behalf may offer trials of Paid Subscriptions for a specified period without payment or at a reduced rate (a “Trial”). By using a Soins Karismä Service via a Trial, you agree to the Soins Karismä Premium Promotional Offer Terms.

soinsKarismaServicePara4.text: Third-Party applications, devices and open source software

soinsKarismaServicePara5.text: Soins Karismä service may be integrated with, or may otherwise interact with, third-party applications, websites, and services (“Third-Party Applications”) and third-party personal computers, mobile handsets, tablets, wearable devices, speakers, and other devices (“Devices”). Your use of such Third-Party Applications and Devices may be subject to additional terms, conditions, and policies provided to you by the applicable third party. Soins Karisma does not guarantee that Third-Party Applications and Devices will be compatible with the Soins Karisma Service.

soinsKarismaServicePara7.text: We use reasonable efforts to keep the Soins Karisma Service operational and to provide you with a personalized, immersive experience. However, our service offerings and their availability may change from time to time, without liability to you; for example:

soinsKarismaServicePara8.text: The Soins Karismä Services may experience temporary interruptions due to technical difficulties, maintenance or testing, or updates, including those required to reflect changes in relevant laws and regulatory requirements.

soinsKarismaServicePara9.text: We aim to evolve and improve the Soins Karismä Service constantly, and we may modify, suspend, or stop (permanently or temporarily) providing all of part of the Soins Karisma Service (including particular functions, features, subscription plans, and promotional offerings);

soinsKarismaServicePara10.text: Soins Karismä has no obligation to provide any specific service through the Soins Karisma Platform and salons. Soins Karismä may remove particular services and other Content without notice.

soinsKarismaServicePara11.text: Soins Karismä has no liability to you, nor any obligation to provide a refund to you, in connection with internet or other service outages or failures that are caused by the actions of government authorities, other third parties, or events beyond our control.

yourUseSoinsKarisma.text: Your Use of the Soins Karisma Service

yourUseSoinsKarismaPara1.text: Before you have the opportunity to make appointments at the salon, you must create your account. The client must visit the Soins Karismä website – www.soinskarisma.com. Once the desired subscription has been paid for, you will receive a confirmation email in which we will send you a link to our booking platform where you can book your appointments.

yourUseSoinsKarismaPara2.text: You need to create a Soins Karismä account to use the Soins Karismä Services. Your username and password are for your personal use only and should be kept confidential. You understand that you are responsible for all use (including any unauthorized use) of your username and password. Notify our Customer Service team immediately if your username or password is lost or stolen, or if you believe there has been unauthorized access to your account.

yourUseSoinsKarismaPara3.text: Soins Karismä may reclaim, or require you to change, your username for any reason.

yourUseSoinsKarismaPara4.text: Your rights to use the Soins Karismä Service

appointmentBookingPara1.text: Once your account is created on the Soins Karismä platform, you can now select the services you want as well as the day and time that suits you. After that, the client will receive an appointment confirmation email within 24 hours.

appointmentBookingPara2.text: Be careful if your appointment has not been approved or if it is still pending, you cannot show up at the salon and benefit from the service, so make sure to receive the confirmation email in your mailbox.

approvedAppointmentPara1.text: If we find it necessary to give you some preparation advice before your appointment, we will contact you within 48 hours before your appointment.

approvedAppointmentPara2.text: It is strongly recommended to arrive 15 minutes before your appointment time.

approvedAppointmentPara3.text: In the event of a delay of 10 minutes or more or an absence from your appointment, a fee of $15 will be deducted from your account.

approvedAppointmentPara4.text: If you want to cancel your appointment, it must be done 24 hours before your appointment.

approvedAppointmentPara5.text: Please note that the subscription is not sharable, to benefit from services at Karismä Care, you must have a unique account to your identity - letting your loved ones take your place at an appointment is not possible.

approvedAppointmentPara6.text: Access to the Soins Karisma Services

approvedAppointmentPara7.text: Subject to your compliance with these Terms (including any other applicable terms and conditions), we grant to you limited, non-exclusive, revocable permission to make personal, non-commercial use of the Soins Karismä Service and the Content (collectively, “Access”). This Access shall remain in effect unless and until terminated by you or Soins Karismä Inc. You agree that you will not redistribute or transfer the Soins Karisma Service or the Content.

approvedAppointmentPara8.text: The Soins Karismä software applications and the Content are licensed, not sold or transferred to you, and Soins Karismä retains ownership of all copies of the Soins Karismä software applications and Content even after installation on your Devices.

monthlySubs90Para1.text: The monthly subscription of $90 per month includes one month of care and beauty services. Customers can have up to 2 active appointments – Please note that it is not possible to book two appointments on the same day.

monthlySubs90Para2.text: An appointment is equal to a treatment in a day, once you have a treatment you can resume a new appointment in the month, the principle is that you always have two maximum active appointments. Please note that the subscription is not refundable, but you can stop it at any time before the next month’s withdrawal by calling us at +1 (514)665-7059 – Head Office Number. Make sure to check the withdrawal date for the next month because they are done automatically thanks to the Stripe platform.

monthlySubs90Para3.text: This subscription is not a contract, you can cancel it for one month and take it back for the next month.

annualSubs1080Para1.text: The $1080 annual subscription includes a full year of care and beauty services. Customers can have up to 4 active appointments – Please note it is not possible to book two appointments on the same day.

annualSubs1080Para2.text: An appointment is equal to a treatment in a day, once you have received a treatment you can resume a new appointment in the month or in the year, the principle is that you always have four maximum active appointments. Please note that the subscription is not refundable.

soinsKarismaProprietaryPara.text: The Soins Karismä Service and the software are the property of Soins Karismä Inc. All Soins Karismä trademarks, service marks, trade names, logos, domain names, and any other features of the Soins Karismä brand (“Soins Karisma Brand Features”) are the sole property of Soins Karismä Inc. These Terms do not grant you any rights to use any Soins Karismä Brand Features whether for commercial or non-commercial use. You agree to abide by the Soins Karisma User Guidelines and not to use the Soins Karismä Service, the Content, or any part thereof in any manner not expressly permitted by these Terms.

billingPara1.text: You may purchase a Paid Subscription directly from Soins Karismä Website or through a third party either by:

billingPara2.text: Paying a subscription fee, Transaction fee plus applicable taxes in advance on a monthly basis or some other recurring interval disclosed to you prior to your purchase; or

billingPara3.text: Prepayment giving you access to the Soins Karisma Service for a specific time period (“Pre-Paid Period”).

billingPara4.text: Tax rates are calculated based on the information you provide and the applicable rate at the time of your monthly charge.

billingPara5.text: If you purchase access to a Paid Subscription through a third party, separate terms and conditions with such third party may apply to your use of the Soins karismä Service in addition to these Terms. Please contact the third party regarding any refunds or to manage your subscription. If you purchase a Paid Subscription using a code, gift card, pre-paid offer, or other offer provided or sold by or on behalf of Soins Karismä for access to a Paid Subscription (“Codes”), you hereby agree to the Soins Karismä Card Terms.

priceTaxChangesPara1.text: Soins Karismä may from time to time make changes to Paid Subscriptions, including recurring subscription fees, the Pre-Paid Period (for periods not yet paid), or Codes, and will communicate any price changes to you in advance. Price changes will take effect at the start of the next subscription period following the date of the price change and, by continuing to use the Soins Karisma Service after the price change takes effect, you will have accepted the new price. If you do not agree to a price change, you can reject the change by unsubscribing from the applicable Paid Subscription prior to the price change going into effect.

priceTaxChangesPara2.text: Tax rates are based on the rates applicable at the time of your monthly charge. These amounts can change over time with local tax requirements in your country, state, territory, county, or city. Any change in tax rate will be automatically applied based on the account information you provide.

renewalCancellationPara1.text: With the exception of Paid Subscriptions for a Pre-Paid Period, your payment to Soins Karismä or the third party through which you purchased the Paid Subscription will automatically renew at the end of the applicable subscription period, unless you cancel your Paid Subscription before the end of the then-current subscription period. Contact our Customer Support team here for instructions on how to cancel. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period.

renewalCancellationPara2.text: We do not provide refunds or credits for any partial subscription periods, except as expressly stated in these Terms.

userGuidelinePara.text: We’ve established guidelines for using the Soins Karisma Service, to make sure the Soins Karismä Service stays enjoyable for everyone (“Soins Karisma User Guidelines”). In using the Soins Karisma Service, you must comply with the Soins Karismä User Guidelines, as well as all applicable laws, rules, and regulations, and respect the intellectual property, privacy, and other rights of third parties.

exportControlPara1.text: Soins Karismä’s products may be subject to Canada export and re-export control laws and regulations or similar laws applicable in other jurisdictions, including the Export Administration Regulations (“EAR”) maintained by the Canada Department of Commerce, trade and economic sanctions maintained by the Treasury Department’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (“OFAC”), and the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (“ITAR”) maintained by the Department of State. You warrant that you are (1) not located in any country to which the Canada has embargoed goods or has otherwise applied any economic sanctions; and (2) not a denied party as specified in any applicable export or re-export laws or regulations or similar laws applicable in other jurisdictions or otherwise listed on any Canada. government list of prohibited or restricted parties.

exportControlPara2.text: You agree to comply with all applicable export and reexport control laws and regulations, including without limitation the EAR and trade and economic sanctions maintained by OFAC. Specifically, you agree not to – directly or indirectly – use, sell, export, reexport, transfer, divert, release, or otherwise dispose of any products, software, or technology (including products derived from or based on such technology) received from Soins Karisma under these Terms to any destination, entity, or person or for any end-use prohibited by the EAR, trade and economic sanctions maintained by OFAC, or any applicable laws or regulations of Canada or any other jurisdiction without obtaining any required prior authorization from the competent government authorities as required by those laws and regulations.

userContentPara1.text: The content you post on the Soins Karisma Service

userContentPara2.text: Soins Karismä users may post, upload, or otherwise contribute content to the Soins Karismä Service (“User Content”). For the avoidance of doubt, “User Content” includes all information, materials and other content that is added, created, uploaded, submitted or posted to the Soins Karismä Service (including to the Soins Karismä Support Community) by users.

userContentPara3.text: You are solely responsible for all User Content that you post.

userContentPara4.text: You promise that, with respect to any User Content you post on Soins Karisma, (1) you own or have the right to post such User Content; and (2) such User Content, or its use by Soins Karismä pursuant to the license granted below, does not: (i) violate these Terms, including the Soins Karismä User Guidelines, applicable law, or the intellectual property or other rights of any third party; or (ii) imply any affiliation with or endorsement of you or your User Content by Soins Karismä or other individual or entity without the prior express written consent from Soins Karismä or such individual or entity.

userContentPara5.text: In posting or sharing User Content or other information on the Soins Karismä Platform, please keep in mind that content and other information will be publicly accessible, and may be used and re-shared by others on the Soins Karismä Platform and across the web, so please use caution in posting or sharing on the Soins Karismä Platform, and be mindful of your account settings. Soins Karismä is not responsible for what you or others post or share on the Soins Karismä Platform.

monitoringUserPara1.text: Soins Karismä may, but has no obligation to, monitor or review User Content. Soins Karismä reserves the right to remove or disable access to any User Content for any or no reason. Soins Karismä may take these actions without prior notification to you.

monitoringUserPara2.text: Licenses that you grant to us

feedbackPara.text: If you provide ideas, suggestions, or other feedback in connection with your use of the Soins Karismä Service or any Content (“Feedback”), such Feedback is not confidential and may be used by Soins Karismä without restriction and without payment to you. Feedback is considered a type of User Content under these Terms.

yourDevicePara.text: You also grant to us the right (1) to allow the Soins Karismä software to use the processor, bandwidth, and storage hardware on your Device in order to facilitate the operation of the Soins Karismä Service, (2) to provide advertising and other information to you, and (3) to allow our business partners to do the same.

contentExperiencePara1.text: In any part of the Soins Karisma Service, the Content that you access, including its selection and placement, may be influenced by commercial considerations, including Soins Karismä’s agreements with third parties.

contentExperiencePara2.text: Some Content licensed by, provided to, created by, or otherwise made available by Soins Karismä (e.g., pictures,magazines or videos) may incorporate advertising or other promotional messages.

infringementClaimsPara.text: Soins Karismä respects the rights of intellectual property owners. If you believe that any Content infringes your copyright rights, please see the Soins Karisma Copyright Policy.

confidentialityPolicyPara1.text: When you visit the Website, we collect certain information about your device, your interactions on the Website and the information necessary to process your purchases.

confidentialityPolicyPara2.text: We may also collect additional information if you contact us for customer support. In this Privacy Policy, we refer to any information about an identifiable individual (including the information below) as “Personal Information”. See the list below to learn more about the personal information we collect and why.

deviceInfoPara.text: Purpose of Collection: To be able to gather information about our customers in order to meet their needs and conduct analyses on the use of the site in order to optimize our site. Source of collection: Collected automatically when you access our site using our questionnaires (tests), cookies, log files, web beacons, tags or pixels. Disclosure for commercial purposes shared with on the Google Cloud platform accessible only for the presidents of the company. Personal information collected: Name, billing address, delivery address, payment information (including credit card numbers), email address and phone number.

legalBasisPara1.text: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”), if you are a resident of the European Economic Area (“EEA”), we process your personal information on the following legal bases:

legalBasisPara2.text: Your consent; The performance of the contract between you and the Site; The fulfilment of our legal obligations; The protection of your vital interests; The performance of a task performed in the public interest; For our legitimate interests, that do not override your fundamental rights and freedoms.

autoDecisionPara1.text: If you are a resident of the EEA, you have the right to object to processing based solely on automated decision-making (which includes profiling), where that decision-making has a legal effect on you or otherwise significantly affects you.

autoDecisionPara2.text: We [DO] make fully automated decisions with legal or otherwise significant effect using customer data.

autoDecisionPara3.text: Our Shopify processor uses limited automated decision-making to prevent fraud that has no legal or otherwise significant effect on you.

autoDecisionPara4.text: Services that include automated decision-making elements include:

autoDecisionPara5.text: A temporary blacklist of IP addresses associated with repeated failed transactions. This blacklist persists for a small number of hours.

autoDecisionPara6.text: Temporary blacklist of credit cards associated with blacklisted IP addresses. This blacklist persists for a small number of days.

aboutTheseTermsPara.text: Under applicable law, you may have certain rights that can’t be limited by a contract. These Terms are in no way intended to restrict those rights.

applicableLawPara.text: These Terms of Use apply to all of our customers both in Canada and internationally.

contactUsPara.text: If you have any questions about our Terms of Use or our Privacy Policy, please contact us by phone at +1 (514)665-7059 or via private message on Facebook or Instagram – Soins Karismä.
